Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: LindaBob77
Reviews.Content: 5 days hotel 3 stars perfect hotel basic bedding bathroom decide holiday location walking everydaythe breakfast basic morning receptionists particularly friendly rome reasonable hotel stay linda bob england

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for. Cheap, but god location”
Reviews.Author: Danish_Greetings
Reviews.Content: rome week 7 simple hotel central spot cheap simple worn cold winter day heat breakfast typically italien simple coffee italian standard sucks centally located guess house location conclusion simple expectations dont plan spend time hotel beside sleeping

Reviews.Title: “Ruins in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Andrew W
Reviews.Content: agent booked till look tripadvisor fear worst sleep cant bad level 5 stayed 4 nights family 4 breakfast pretty ordinary bad reviews shower mmmmm mmmmmm cold fresh stinking hot loss weight burning layer skin using brought attention day wasnt till day left tried fix didnt didnt risk allowing kids shower internal lock didnt brought attention yep look looked didnt fix noise location main street walked honest location didnt add value pay clean fair owners dont truely understand customers

Reviews.Title: “David Bristol”
Reviews.Author: david m
Reviews.Content: dont book hotel dusty dirty holes safety hazzard faulty plugs sockets mould bathroomthe entrace lobby dimly lit cold uninviting staff shame rome beautiful plus plenty cleaner safer hotels

Reviews.Title: “Good location but that's about it.....”
Reviews.Author: Irene A
Reviews.Content: agree reviewsthe horrible seen days youre lucky manage hot shower clue managed look amazing website whoever website spent endless hours scared switch ac im advantage location cause central close metro main attractions breakfast dry cheap exactly pay

Reviews.Title: “terrible place ...cheap though!”
Reviews.Author: Artur A
Reviews.Content: nice hotel shiny website idea managed shoot photos probably photos locations hotel shabby run breakfast horrible dry rolls 2 days processed plastic cheese slices terrible ham air condition hostel clos window sounded sleeping street friend huge spots walls

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great value, clean and comfortable!”
Reviews.Author: Clare-Marie_93
Reviews.Content: read reviews hotel arrived expecting broken dangerous unsafe unclean hostile hostel actually arriving couldnt believe wrong stayed hotels italy favourites shared fellow students clean neat perfectly sufficient city stay television time watch twenty students sharing impressed hostel dreaded broken dirty shower packed expectation rough bathroom lovely shower hot cold water hygienic cleaning service didnt expect view window wonderful stayed american flag outside window cant remember beds clean comfortable slept england idea reviews complain horrible smell none noticed unusual hotel busy street hear sounds city night disturb sleep im light sleeper youve spent 8 hours day footing rome sleep isnt difficult money breakfast service absolutely fine id security perfectly fine students incidents theft didnt particular value cameras dread people dodgy 1950s lift actually looked nice opinion fine youre looking luxury modern hotel intend spend day dread ripped wall paper damaged wall paintings isnt youve rome amazing sights eternal city hotel shower sleep comfortably repubblica hotel ideal student fantastic 247 reception plenty eat drink brilliant location lucky hotel comparing students worst fear bit shabbiness thats hope enjoy stay

Reviews.Title: “Much Better Than Expected”
Reviews.Author: JemCollins
Reviews.Content: reading various reviews website highly dubious forthcoming stay hotel feeling trepidation entered doors enormous recently decorated paint peeling slightly clean stocked bedding clean towels bathroom clean showers hot times travel plug adapters countries breakfast adequate expected consisted coffee juice meats rolls croissants cake cereals bad price free wifi reception handy check 24 hours read reports stolen valuables probably standard practice stolen staff spoke english quick sort lift looked fine return

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: Peadug Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: reading views trip advisor expecting hotel surprisingly clean comfortable value money despite central location noisy slept bathroom sorted speedily breakfast average adequate stay rome business reminder comments
